front.title: Network Service Header (NSH) Explicit Congestion Notification (ECN) Support

abstract.t: Explicit congestion notification (ECN) allows a forwarding element to notify downstream devices of the onset of congestion without having to drop packets. This can improve network efficiency through better congestion control without packet drops. This document specifies ECN support within Service Function Chaining (SFC) domains through use of the Network Service Header (NSH).
